resources.string: When you first open the application you should see a wheel that is divided into eight different food categories. If you press the "SPIN!" button you will see the wheel spin! When it comes to a stop it will be on a random food category. The bar above the wheel is an adjustable bar that determines how far away you are willing to travel to. The application will return restaurants within the distance you choose.

After having spun the wheel you will be brought to another screen that will display the random restaurant that was chosen for you based on the random food category that you landed on. This restaurant will have a rating of at least 4 stars on Yelp and will be within the radius that you have provided.

From the restaurant display screen you have a few choices. You can choose to share this restaurant and its information with your contacts or you can choose to view directions to this restaurant from your current location (If you encounter any issues related to the directions feature, please ensure that you gave the app permission to use location service).

This application utilizes the Yelp API in order to display restaurants to the user. Specifically, the application uses the "business search" feature of the API. The various parameters that can be obtained using this feature of the API can be found at:

The application accesses the latitude and longitude of nearby restaurants in order to return a restaurant to the user that is within the provided range radius. The app also fetches the rating of the restaurants in order to assure that only restaurants with four stars and above are returned.
\"Why do I need to grant the app permission to use my location?\"
The application requests to access your location in order to provide you with directions from your current location to the restaurant.
\"How can I view more than one review for each restaurant?\"
By clicking on the \"Yelp Profile\" button you can be brought to the official Yelp page for that given restaurant. This page will contain more than one review!
\"Is there a limited number of restaurants for each of the categories?\"
The application utilizes the information provided by Yelp to access the restaurants that are displayed. If the restaurant is within your selected radius and is on Yelp, it can show up!
